verses.text: (א) I will bless the \sc Lord\sc* at all times: His praise \add shall\add* continually \add be\add* in my mouth.
(ב) My soul shall make her boast in the \sc Lord\sc*: The humble shall hear \add thereof\add*, and be glad.
(ג) O magnify the \sc Lord\sc* with me, And let us exalt his name together.
(ד) I sought the \sc Lord\sc*, and he heard me, And delivered me from all my fears.
(ה) They looked unto him, and were lightened: (ו) And their faces were not ashamed.
(ז) This poor \add man\add* cried, and the \sc Lord\sc* heard \add him\add*, And saved him out of all his troubles.
(ח) The angel of the \sc Lord\sc* encampeth Round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
(ט) O taste and see that the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* good: Blessed \add is\add* the man \add that\add* trusteth in him.
(י) O fear the \sc Lord\sc*, ye his saints: For \add there is\add* no want to them that fear him.
(כ) The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: But they that seek the \sc Lord\sc* shall not want any good \add thing\add*.
(ל) Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the \sc Lord\sc*.
(מ) What man \add is he that\add* desireth life, \add And\add* loveth \add many\add* days, that \add he\add* may see good?
(נ) Keep thy tongue from evil, And thy lips from speaking guile.
(ס) Depart from evil, and do good; Seek peace, and pursue it.
(ע) The eyes of the \sc Lord\sc* \add are\add* upon the righteous, And his ears \add are open\add* unto their cry.
(פ) The face of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* against them that do evil, To cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
(צ) \add The righteous\add* cry, and the \sc Lord\sc* heareth, And delivereth them out of all their troubles.
(ק) The \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; And saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
(ר) Many \add are\add* the afflictions of the righteous: But the \sc Lord\sc* delivereth him out of them all.
(ש) He keepeth all his bones: Not one of them is broken.
(ת) Evil shall slay the wicked: And they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
(פ) The \sc Lord\sc* redeemeth the soul of his servants: And none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
